name: Facial Movement Detection

inputs.name: Detect
inputs.description: Face select includes Face 0, Face 1, Face 2, Face 3, Face 4, Any; Track any face if choosing Any

inputs.name: Facial Movement
inputs.description: Facial movement including Eye Blink Left, Eye Blink Right, Eye Blink Both, Eye Blink Either, Mouth Open, Mouth Pout, Eyebrow Wiggle

outputs.name: Begin
outputs.description: Execute the next node when the facial movement begins

outputs.name: Stay
outputs.description: Keep executing the next node when the facial movement stays, note that even with movements such as blink, the fastest eye blink will still have one frame as "stay"

outputs.name: End
outputs.description: Execute the next node when the facial movement ends

outputs.name: None
outputs.description: Keep executing the next node when the facial movement is not detected

description: Detect facial movement; Note that each facial movement has four states, "begin", "stay", "end", and "none", and for movement such as eye blink, even the fastest blink will still have one frame "stay" state.
